f the 11 issues raised by the Plain(cid:415)ﬀ, Issue No. 7 has a direct nexus to the ques(cid:415)on of
law raised by the Plain(cid:415)ﬀ before this Court and is therefore re-produced below:
“Has  the  Plain(cid:415)ﬀ  suﬀered  loss  and  damage  to  the  extent  of  Rs.  1,222,055,92  in
consequence of the default of the contractor?”.

A
lthough it was sought to be argued before the High Court that mere default on the part
of  the  Contractor  would  en(cid:415)tle  the  Plain(cid:415)ﬀ  to  claim  a  sum  of  Rs.  1,222,055  from  the

very much aware that he was required to establish that he has suﬀered loss and damage
to the extent of the value in P4.

he  Plain(cid:415)ﬀ  gave  evidence  and  led  the  evidence  of  T.P.  Weerasinghe,  the  Managing
